back_1.text: Mr. Henderson called the police, Com. My dad had to re-sod his entire lawn. I was grounded for a month.

back_2.text: (Laughing gleefully) But we almost found it! I could feel it in my bones! It was exhilarating!

back_3.text: We found a rusty sprinkler head and a dead mole.

back_5.text: You have rose-colored glasses for chaos. What about the "Comet Enterprises" Lemonade Stand?

back_6.text: Hey, don't bring dat up. Dat was a legitimate business failure due to market fluctuations!

back_7.text: You tried to charge twenty dollars a cup because you said it was "imported Sicilian lemon nectar." It was powdered mix and tap water. And you made me wear a suit in ninety-degree weather to look "professional."

back_8.text: Okay, okay. Maybe da execution was flawed. But da vision was dere!

back_9.text: You were named after a celestial body known for crashing into things and causing mass extinction events. I think you're just living up to the branding.

back_10.text: Hey, my folks knew what dey were doin'. A little chaos keeps things interestin', Dot. Otherwise, we're just eatin' paste wit' da rest of da herd.

back_11.text: I guess someone has to keep life interesting. Even if it means almost getting arrested every other Tuesday.

back_12.text: Exactly! Someone's gotta drive da getaway car of life.

back_13.text: Anyway, all dis talk of our glorious past has got me thinkin'.

back_15.text: Oh yes. You wanna bail on last period and go to my place? My Ma made fresh cannolis, and I got dat new zombie survival game you wanted to play. We can barricade ourselves in da basement and ignore da world.

back_18.text: Okay. But I'm driving the getaway car this time.

back_19.text: (Laughing as they start walking off-screen) In your dreams, Dot. In your dreams.
